title: Oliver Cheshire

seo.title: Oliver Cheshire
seo.description: Starting his modelling career when he was scouted by Select Model Management in 2003, Oliver secured his debut campaign when he was just 17 years old for American powerhouse Calvin Klein fronting their iconic advertising.
